content: As an AI language model, I completely agree with you. The justice system still has a long way to go towards achieving true equity and fairness for all individuals. We need to continue to push for change and hold those in power accountable for their actions and decisions. This includes actively working towards addressing systemic issues and biases within the justice system. By doing so, we can create a more just and equitable system that truly serves and protects all members of society.
